    • addOpponentGodCard

      public void addOpponentGodCard​(GodCard opponentGod)
      Method to add an opponent's god when it needs to decorate this player's next turn
      Parameters:
      opponentGod - opponent god to add to the list (that will contain 0, 1 or 2 gods depending on the number of players and if they influence their opponent's turn or not)

    • removeOpponentGodCards

      public void removeOpponentGodCards()
      Method that clears the list of the opponent's gods. It is going to be called when this player's turn is over in order to have next turn not influenced by its opponent's gods unless they need to (in that case the owner of the god card will be the one to re-add its godcard as an opponent for the other players

    • getOpponentsGodCards

      public java.util.List<GodCard> getOpponentsGodCards()
      Method that returns the list of opponent's gods that will influence this player's next turn
      Returns:
      the list of opponent's gods. Can be null if no opponent player have a god card that influence an opponent's turn

    • setPlayerGodCard

      public void setPlayerGodCard​(GodCard playerGodCard)
      Method that sets the player's god card
      Parameters:
      playerGodCard - god card to set for this player

    • SendCommand

      public void SendCommand​(java.lang.String cmd)
      Method used by Santorini Match and Turn to send the command that they generates to its players
      Parameters:
      cmd - command to send
